programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The welterweight superfight between former GLORY world champion Endy Semeleer (36-2, 18 KO) and current GLORY lightweight world champion Tyjani Beztati (26-4, 9 KO) will take center stage in the main event of the evening. After dominating the lightweight division, Beztati moves up to welterweight for the very first time in his GLORY career. GLORY featherweight world champion Petch (169-40-3, 27 KO) and RISE national champion Kento Haraguchi (25-3-1, 14 KO) made their trilogy fight official for the co-main event. Two former middleweight title challengers collide as the number one ranked Michael Boapeah (17-4-1, 7 KO) takes on the number three ranked Ulric Bokeme (32-5, 17 KO), both...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The main event will see two of the light heavyweight division’s most explosive young prospects clash as Romania’s Stefan Latescu (17-3, 8 KO) faces Turkey’s Cem Caceres (16-1, 13 KO). Belgium based Albanian Berjan Peposhi (29-4, 16 KO) will compete in the co-main event. The always exciting featherweight welcomes rising star Ayoub Bourass (14-1, 4 KO) in to make his GLORY debut. International Muay Thai superstar Youssef Boughanem (188-43-8, 120 KO) returns for his sophomore GLORY outing against tough Italian Angelo Volpe (38-5, 12 KO). Former middleweight title contender Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-10, 36 KO) takes on Antwerp’s own Jente Nnamadim (21-5, 11 KO), who comes in to make his GLORY...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: From the PaloLottomatica in Rome, Italy on November 3, 2012. This event featured the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament final 8 Quarter Finals, Semifinals and Final. Albert Kraus withdrew from the tournament due to the flu and was replaced by Yoshihiro Sato.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A five-round heavyweight title eliminator between the number one ranked contender Levi Rigters (18-2, 8 KO) and ‘The Golden Wolf’ Bahram Rajabzadeh (69-3, 61 KO). The winner will face ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven (64-10, 21 KO) on December 7 in the main event of COLLISION 7. In the co-main event of the evening, Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-4-1, 13 KO) clashes with Nico ‘Big Sexy’ Horta (23-9, 3 KO) in a monster heavyweight clash with big implication for the rankings. Croatian kickboxing legend Mladen Brestovac (55-14-1, 37 KO) will make his final walk to the ring in his hometown of Zagreb. ‘The Scorpion Sting’ will take on newcomer Karim Dian (16-13, 3 KO) to cap off an illustrious...

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E39 Jodha Akbar S3 E39
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: Sangram Bhalerao aka Simmba is an unabashedly corrupt policeman who does not hesitate to make the local ganglord Durva his brother from another mother to ensure a regular inflow of bribes. Meanwhile, Simmba falls in love with Shagun, who runs a catering service next to Miramar Police Station in Goa, where he is stationed. He even finds a sister in a 19-year-old medical student, Aakruti, who teaches orphans in her free time. Soon, Aakruti stumbles upon a drug smuggling ring run by Durva's brothers and is brutally raped and killed. This twist in the tale transforms Simmba and forces him to choose the righteous path.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
programme.desc: When Gurunam Singh Dhillon shifted to Bombay from Punjab with the hopes of making it big in the city, he not only married the love of his life but also inherited 22 buffaloes. Dhillon now has everything he had ever hoped for, but one characteristic trait that he could not hand down to his only son, Suraj Singh Dhillon, is his innate ability to win over girls. Multiple rejections later, Suraj’s friend Sukhi suggests that he be the bad guy whom girls usually like. So, when a prospective bride finally gives her nod, Suraj loses that last flickering hope to a set of photos of him chugging beer. Suraj finds the culprit behind this and seeks revenge.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E35 Jodha Akbar S3 E35
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Dwie Strony Dolara
programme.desc: Nauczyciel, rewolwerowiec, były pułkownik i piękna kobieta układają plan napadu na Fort Henderson. Kiedy im się to udaje, kłopoty dopiero się zaczynają.

programme.title: Zabójstwo za Sto Tysięcy Dolarów

programme.title: Dzikie Rewolwery
programme.desc: Okrutny i bezwzględny bandyta zabija właściciela tawerny, który wydał go władzom.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Najgorszy Rewolwerowiec Dzikiego Zachodu
programme.desc: Ułaskawiona złodziejka zostaje rządową agentką. Aby móc wyruszyć z karawaną na zachód, mieć męża. Wychodzi więc za mąż za naiwnego i niczego niepodejrzewającego dentystę ze wschodniego wybrzeża.

programme.title: Mściciel
programme.desc: Clay Hardin chce porzucić odznakę, ale gdy bandyta zabija szeryfa, rusza w pościg. Dołącza do niego łowca nagród i tajemnicza kobieta. Trop prowadzi na terytorium Apaczów, gdzie odkrywają plan sprzedaży broni Indianom.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Zwali go Cemetery
programme.desc: John i George McIntire to dwaj naiwni braci, którzy wyjeżdżają do ogarniętego bezprawiem miasteczka na dalekim zachodzie, aby zobaczyć się z ojcem.

programme.title: Czterej Zabójcy Sartany
programme.desc: Siedmiu zamaskowanych bandytów porywa młodą Susy, kuzynkę burmistrza Clayton City, Franka Clonny'ego. Frank przyjmuje 15.000 dolarów okupu, którego żądają bandyci i obmyśla plan, który pozwoli mu odzyskać pieniądze i schwytać bandytów.

programme.title: Joshua - Czarny Jeździec
programme.desc: Joshua, czarnoskóry weteran wojny secesyjnej, wraca do rodzinnego miasta, by odkryć, że jego matka została zamordowana przez biały gang. Zdeterminowany, by wymierzyć sprawiedliwość, staje się łowcą nagród i wyrusza na brutalną, pełną niebezpieczeństw misję zemsty.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 37, 38, 39
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Na Imię Mi Mallory... M Znaczy Śmierć
programme.desc: Emerytowany pułkownik Harper pragnie udać się na emeryturę na swoje ranczo, ale nikczemny Bart Ambler również interesuje się tą posiadłością.

programme.title: Dzień bezprawia
programme.desc: Ranczer Blaise Starrett i osadnicy są skłóceni, ale gdy brutalny gang Jacka Bruhna napada na ich miasteczko, muszą zjednoczyć siły. Tylko razem mają szansę na przetrwanie nocy i ocalenie swojej społeczności.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Sześciu Łowców Głów do Masakry
programme.desc: Gubernator Kansas wynajmuje sześciu rewolwerowców, aby obalić despotyczne rządy samozwańczego bossa Abilene, który przetrzymuje kilku zakładników, w tym rodzinę gubernatora.

programme.title: Requiem dla Gringo
programme.desc: Wyjątkowy eurowestern, którego bohaterem jest astrolog noszący garnitur w panterkę.

programme.title: Generał
programme.desc: Kolorowa wersja filmu. Kiedy szpiedzy Unii kradną ukochaną lokomotywę inżyniera, ten samotnie ściga ją prosto przez linie wroga.

programme.title: Umarli nie rzucają cienia
programme.desc: Lazar, bezwzględny łowca nagród, przybywa do górniczego miasteczka, by szantażować wpływowego właściciela kopalni. Śledzi go młody rewolwerowiec z własnym celem. Gdy ich ścieżki się krzyżują, powstaje nieoczekiwany sojusz przeciwko tyranii i chciwości.

programme.title: Kto pragnie zemsty?
programme.desc: Dwóch rewolwerowców wjeżdża do miasta z planem odebrania dużej, acz niezasłużonej nagrody. Zostają wplątani w lokalną wojnę o ziemię związaną ze zbliżającą się budową kolei.

programme.title: Zwą Mnie Alleluja
programme.desc: Generał Ramirez walczy o rewolucję w Meksyku przeciwko europejskiej dominacji. Wynajmuje Hallelujah, tajemniczego rewolwerowca, by zlikwidował europejskiego cesarza Maksymiliana, przejmując sakiewkę z klejnotami, która miała być przeznaczona na zakup broni.

programme.title: Jeden po Drugim
programme.desc: Na granicy Teksasu i Meksyku, podczas wojny secesyjnej, pułkownik Greyson został oskarżony o zdefraudowanie 500 000 dolarów, które miał dostarczyć dowództwu Konfederacji.

programme.title: Jack Błyskawica
programme.desc: Błyskawica Jack Kane jest australijskim banitą na dzikim zachodzie. Podczas nieudanego napadu na bank bierze na zakładnika niemego Bena Doyle'a. Dwójka staje się dobrymi przyjaciółmi, z Jackiem uczącym Bena jak obrabiać banki, podczas gdy oni planują ostatni skok Jacka.

programme.title: Córka Belle Starr
programme.desc: Bob "Bitter Creek" Yauntis zabija Belle Starr i przejmuje gang. Nowy szeryf Tom Jackson zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o jej śmierć przez jej córkę Rose. Aby oczyścić swoje imię i zyskać jej zaufanie, rusza tropem gangu. Western o zemście, odkupieniu i walce o sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 40, 41, 42
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Django i Sartana na Zachodzie
programme.desc: Gang bezwzględnych banitów pod wodzą szalonego Czarnego Burta Kellera porywa Jessicę Colby i postanawia uciec do Meksyku. Sprytny łowca nagród Django i świątobliwy rewolwerowiec Sartana łączą siły, by uratować biedaczkę z nikczemnych szponów gangu.

programme.title: Dyliżans
programme.desc: Grupa podróżująca dyliżansem zbliża się do siebie z powodu zagrożenia ze strony Geronimo i przy okazji dowiaduje się więcej o sobie nawzajem.

programme.title: Poker z Rewolwerami
programme.desc: Po przegraniu wszystkiego w pokera i zaciągnięciu długu, Lucas zgadza się dostarczyć wóz do miasteczka Chamaco za 5000 dolarów zapłaty. Wkrótce wpada w wielkie tarapaty z bandytami, lokalnym bossem miasta i piękną pracownicą saloonu.

programme.title: Szalony Pies Morgan
programme.desc: Prawdziwa historia irlandzkiego banity Daniela Morgana, który jest poszukiwany, żywy lub martwy, w Australii w latach 50-tych XIX wieku.

programme.title: Strzały w Apache Wells
programme.desc: Po latach nieobecności młody mężczyzna wraca na rodzinne ranczo. Na miejscu odkrywa, że gang chce przejąć nie tylko jego ziemię, ale też ukochaną. Zaczyna się walka o to, co najcenniejsze – dom, miłość i sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Miasteczko Abilene
programme.desc: Pierwszy raz w kolorze! Klasyczny amerykański western z 1946 roku z Randolphem Scottem w roli głównej: Miasteczko Abilene. Szeryf stara się zapobiec sporom między osadnikami na Dzikim Zachodzie po wojnie secesyjnej.

programme.title: O jednego dolara za dużo
programme.desc: Hazardzista, strzelec i aktor – trzech różnych przestępców z Dzikiego Zachodu łączy niełatwy sojusz w pogoni za skradzionym majątkiem. Czy ich różnice pozwolą im przetrwać i zdobyć 400 000 dolarów?

programme.title: Rewolwer za Sto Trumien
programme.desc: Po powrocie z wojny secesyjnej Jim Slade odkrywa, że jego rodzice nie żyją na farmie.

programme.title: Dobrze Jest Ufać... Ale Lepiej Strzelać
programme.desc: Napad nie udaje się z powodu śmierci przywódcy bandytów. Trzech rabusiów próbuje uzyskać łup. Wieść się rozchodzi i inni dołączają do walki o gotówkę.

programme.title: Zachód słońca nad Kolorado
programme.desc: Ranczer pomaga przyjacielowi odzyskać odziedziczone pole, ale zostaje oskarżony o jego morderstwo.

programme.title: Piekielny Posterunek
programme.desc: Weteran wojny w Korei próbuje pomóc właścicielowi kopalni w małym miasteczku w rozwoju kopalni wolframu, pomimo wysiłków szefa miasta, aby go powstrzymać

programme.title: Nadchodzi Durango, Płać Albo Giń
programme.desc: Windykator wplątuje się w niebezpieczną sytuację, gdy skorumpowany biznesmen, dla którego odzyskał 100 000 dolarów, nie chce mu zapłacić zwyczajowego procentu za jego usługi.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec od Stu Krzyży
programme.desc: Na Dzikim Zachodzie ginie pewien Irlandczyk. Jego syn Jimmy wyrusza na poszukiwanie zabójców ojca, ale wpada w zasadzkę i również zostaje zabity.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 43, 44, 45
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Mój pierwszy cud
programme.desc: Film opowiada historię Angeliki, 16-letniej dziewczyny, która walczy z rzadką chorobą nowotworową - zespołem mielodysplastycznym. Film opowiada o próbie prowadzenia normalnego życia i szukaniu nadziei na znalezienie pierwszej prawdziwej miłości, zanim będzie za późno.

programme.title: O Kościach i Ludziach
programme.desc: Życie szóstki zaprzyjaźnionych graczy RPG zostaje wywrócone do góry nogami, gdy jeden z nich zaciąga się do wojska i jedzie do Iraku. Geek movie bez samouwielbienia.

programme.title: Zabawny Derek
programme.desc: Derek staje w obronie swojej komedii, ponieważ nie może zdradzić swoich marzeń.

programme.title: Entliczek Pentliczek
programme.desc: Raul, kierowca holownika w Miami Beach, uczy się, że każdy wybór ma swoje nagrody i konsekwencje.

programme.title: Długi John Silver: Powrót na wyspę skarbów
programme.desc: Long John Silver trafia na Karaiby, gdzie dowiaduje się o porwaniu córki gubernatora i Jima Hawkinsa przez pirata Mendozę. Silver planuje ich ratunek, licząc też na zdobycie statku i powrót po skarby. Jednak misja szybko okazuje się znacznie trudniejsza, niż zakładał.

programme.title: Ujeżdżanie Barbie
programme.desc: Nieudana tinderowa randka kończy się tym, że fitnessowa influencerka Barbie gubi się w dziczy. Barbie walczy o przetrwanie, a przy okazji jest świadkiem działań Departamentu Bezpieczeństwa Krajowego i ataku kosmitów. Na domiar złego nie ma zasięgu i nie może wrzucić swoich selfie do sieci.

programme.title: Chelsea
programme.desc: Kiedy najlepsza przyjaciółka Chelsea, Laura, zaręcza się i wyprowadza z ich mieszkania, zostaje jej coś więcej niż tylko pusty pokój.

programme.title: Dutch Kills
programme.desc: Zdesperowany ex skazaniec zbiera dawną ekipę, żeby spłacić dług swojej siostry u niebezpiecznego lokalnego przestępcy.

programme.title: Geneza. Upadek Imperium Zbrodnii
programme.desc: Dla tajnego detektywa i jego partnera, wydarzenia wydają się być typową walką o władzę w gangach, ale przerażający lalkarz kryminalny poszukuje potężnego artefaktu, za pomocą którego może zmienić równowagę sił i zdobyć moc bogów.

programme.title: Pokaż Się
programme.desc: Przyszedł, żeby pogodzić się ze stratą. Coś nie chce mu na to pozwolić.

programme.title: Prawdziwe oblicze ulicy
programme.desc: Dub, szef gangu narkotykowego, trafia do więzienia i prosi swoją siostrę, by go zastąpiła. Charlotte musi zdobyć szacunek w brutalnym świecie zachodniej strony miasta. Gdy jego ludzie zaczynają ją kwestionować, ona pokazuje, dlaczego to właśnie ją Dub wybrał.

programme.title: Ostatnia Wola Elijah
programme.desc: Lawrence Shaw pracuje jako specjalista w agencji reklamowej. Ludzie po prostu nie mogą zaakceptować go za to, kim jest.

programme.title: Przekraczając granice
programme.desc: Szeryf z teksańskiego miasteczka zakochuje się w nielegalnej imigrantce z Ameryki Łacińskiej. Gdy okazuje się, że była świadkiem morderstwa na granicy, ich uczucie zostaje wystawione na ciężką próbę. Miłość, lojalność i prawo ścierają się w cieniu granicznej przemocy.

programme.title: Złamany
programme.desc: Zhańbiona gwiazda sportu uzależniona także od hazardu próbuje zmienić swoje życie dzięki wsparciu swojego fana numer jeden.

programme.title: Mexican Gangster 2: Zemsta
programme.desc: Oparty na prawdziwej historii Johnny Sun, grany przez Damiana Chapę, którego ojciec był Meksykaninem, a matka pochodziła z Irlandii, postanawia porzucić przestępczą przeszłość. Po odkryciu, że nie ma innego sposobu na przetrwanie i utrzymanie rodziny przy życiu, Johnny decyduje się wrócić na drugą stronę. Siostra członka kartelu zostaje porwana, a syn Johnny'ego widzi szansę na jej uratowanie i bezpieczny powrót. Kiedy Johnny Sun bezpiecznie sprowadza kobietę do Leviego i jego brata Moshe, otrzymuje od braci z kartelu pokaźną sumę pieniędzy. Johnny zostaje jednak zatrzymany przez CIA, która próbuje zabić jednego z braci, wykorzystując taktykę „dziel i rządź”. Johnny zostaje wykorzystany...

programme.title: Ognista Wyspa
programme.desc: Nowoczesna wersja "Czarnoksiężnika z Oz" o młodej kobiecie, która po tragedii próbuje odnaleźć drogę do domu. Życie Mimi wywróciło się do góry nogami! Ze szczęśliwej żony zmieniła się w roztrzęsioną wdowę i roztrzepaną kochankę, mając zaledwie trzydzieści lat. Jest zdeterminowana, by odnaleźć drogę powrotną do szczęśliwego życia. Podróż Mimi rozpoczyna się na Fire Island.

programme.title: Czarny Łabędź
programme.desc: Osławiony pirat Henry Morgan zostaje gubernatorem Jamajki. Wzywa dawnych towarzyszy do walki z korsarzami, by uwolnić Karaiby. Kiedy jeden z nich porywa córkę poprzedniego gubernatora, wojna na śmierć i życie staje się nieunikniona. Morgan zmaga się także z uczuciami do pięknej arystokratki.

programme.title: Ostatnia szansa
programme.desc: Młody mężczyzna zostaje zwolniony z więzienia. Teraz ma szansę na zmianę swojego życia. Ale ulice się nie zmieniły. Dalej panuje na nich ta sama nienawiść, żal i strach. Właśnie to czeka na niego po drugiej stronie muru. Czy nasz bohater kiedykolwiek odzyska prawdziwą wolność?

programme.title: Źli Ludzie
programme.desc: Dziwna i inteligentna czarna komedia, pełna s*xu, przemocy, brudnej polityki i sławy, BAD PEOPLE to przezabawna opowieść, która przypomina nam, że każdy z nas ma swoją ciemną stronę!

programme.title: Zwyczajna Rodzina
programme.desc: Cztero osobową rodzinę dopada ich ukryte życie, izolacja od siebie nawzajem i przeszłość. Kulminacją jest jedyna rzecz, której unikali... konfrontacja. Rodzina rozpada się, gdy żona i matka ukrywa swój alkoholizm, a mąż próbuje ukryć swoje pożądanie do innej kobiety. Córka eksperymentuje z seksem, narkotykami i alkoholem, a syn tworzy sobie wyimaginowanego przyjaciela, który jest jego opiekunem.

programme.title: Cyrano De Bergerac
programme.desc: Cyrano, szermierz-poeta o długim nosie, kocha piękną Roxane. Ona wyznaje miłość do przystojnego, lecz mało elokwentnego Christiana. Cyrano, pomagając mu zdobyć serce Roxane, wplątuje się w tragiczny zakład. Historia miłości, poświęcenia i nieporozumień.

programme.title: Księżna z Cancun
programme.desc: Mężczyzna wciąż zakochany w swojej byłej dziewczynie zgadza się pojechać z nią do Cancun, gdzie spotyka miejscową dziewczynę - co zmusza go do zakwestionowania wszystkiego, czego chce w życiu.

programme.title: Szczyt Druida
programme.desc: Zbuntowany nastolatek trafia do ojca, strażnika parku, gdzie odkrywa niezwykłą więź z wilkami. Jego pasja do tych majestatycznych zwierząt zmienia jego życie i pomaga mu odnaleźć swoje miejsce w świecie.

programme.title: Buntownik z Mafii
programme.desc: Przez śmiertelną pomyłkę mafijny najemnik rozpoczyna brutalną krucjatę przeciwko swojemu szefowi, jednocześnie mierząc się ze swoją przeszłością.

programme.title: Brutalna Rzeczywistość
programme.desc: Wyszkolony przez FBI neuropsycholog łączy siły ze złodziejką, by znaleźć urządzenie zmieniające rzeczywistość, podczas gdy jej szalony były szef próbuje ich schwytać.

programme.title: Mroczne Sny
programme.desc: Rozwiedziona pisarka wprowadza się do nowego domu, aby rozpocząć pisanie kolejnej książki. Nie wie, że ten dom ma pewne mroczne tajemnice.

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Dzień Pierwszy
programme.desc: Dwie bratnie dusze zostają uwięzione razem pod koniec III wojny światowej, a ich życia zostają na zawsze splecione.

programme.title: Szklana szczęka
programme.desc: Glass Jaw (Szklana szczęka) to historia odkupienia Travisa Austina, dawnego mistrza boksu, który trafiwszy do więzienia traci wszystko. Po wyjściu na wolność doświadcza los popoddaje go wielu próbom; napotyka także trudności związane z odzyskaniem reputacji, mistrzowskiego pasa i prawdziwej miłości.

programme.title: Samotna Siódemka
programme.desc: Rodzina Sagerów podróżuje z Missouri do Oregonu, szukając lepszego życia. Po śmierci rodziców, najstarszy syn, John, mimo sceptycyzmu dorosłych, podejmuje się prowadzenia młodszych braci i sióstr przez niebezpieczne tereny, by kontynuować podróż. Fabularyzowana historia prawdziwej przygody.

programme.title: Metoda Menkoffa
programme.desc: W tej satyrycznej komedii introwertyczny pracownik banku, David Cork, łączy siły z człowiekiem od zadań specjalnych Ruby Jacksonem, by pokonać złego guru HRu - Maxa Menkoffa.

programme.title: Porzucony syn
programme.desc: Kylie Morgan jest prywatnym detektywem polującym na bezdusznego zabójcę. Nie ma nic poza czystą wolą. Prędko znajduje pomoc w detektywie Anthonym Woodsie.

programme.title: Rozdział 27
programme.desc: Film o Marku Davidzie Chapmanie w dniach poprzedzających niesławne morderstwo Beatlesa Johna Lennona.

programme.title: Miłosne Chwyty
programme.desc: Studenci college'u ryzykują wszystko, aby zdemaskować tajny projekt wojskowy mający na celu "uzbrojenie" miłości.

programme.title: Białe niebo
programme.desc: Trójka turystów ucieka w głąb lasu po tym, jak obcy atakują ich miasteczko i zaczynają zmieniać ludzi w bezwolne istoty. Z pomocą tajemniczego samotnika próbują przetrwać, lecz nie wszyscy unikają zarażenia. Ukryci w dziczy, odkrywają, że przed inwazją nie ma ucieczki.

programme.title: Wszystko o Ewie
programme.desc: Wszystko o Eve. Eva, rezolutna i powabna młoda dżokejka, przenika do stajni Pope'a Healy'ego, bogatego magnata wyścigowego.

programme.title: Droga przed nami
programme.desc: W trakcie II wojny światowej grupa brytyjskich poborowych przechodzi transformację od niezdyscyplinowanej drużyny do zgranego zespołu, dzięki sile woli swojego sierżanta i porucznika. W obliczu działań na froncie w Afryce Północnej, odkrywają brutalną rzeczywistość wojny.

programme.title: Bandyci z Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Rozwydrzony pięciolatek Byron Reed (Chris Williams) w noc poprzedzającą rodzinną wycieczkę jest niegrzeczny, więc jego matka (Natasha Alam) każe mu usiąść na karnym krzesełku. Kiedy Byron budzi się w pustym domu, zakłada, że spełniło się jego życzenie, by nie mieć rodziny.

programme.title: Komfort
programme.desc: Nocny kurier zgadza się odebrać zadziorną córkę ważnego klienta. Dwoje młodych ludzi nawiązuje bliską więź i spędza dwie noce na poznawaniu lokalnej sceny kulinarnej Los Angeles, podczas gdy ich romans rozkwita.

programme.title: Moja córka
programme.desc: Prawdziwa historia pisarza Williama Allena White'a i jego córki Mary, której nagła śmierć w wieku 16 lat odcisnęła głębokie piętno na jego życiu. Wzruszający portret miłości, straty i trwałego hołdu ojca dla swojego uduchowionego dziecka.

programme.title: Magiczny miecz
programme.desc: George, syn czarownicy, wyrusza na ratunek porwanej księżniczce Helenie. Wbrew woli matki i rywalizując z rycerzem Brantonem, stawia czoła potworom, pułapkom i smokowi. Dzięki magii i odwadze podejmuje walkę z czarodziejem Lodakiem, by ocalić ukochaną i zdobyć jej serce.

programme.title: Desperadoes of the West
programme.desc: A group of ranchers, led by Colonel Arnold and Ward Gordon, are drilling an oil well but getting fierce opposition from an unknown gang of outlaws. Eastern promoter J.B. Dude Dawson is behind the gang as he is out to prevent the co-op members from striking oil before their lease expires, so he can secure the property for his company. When Ward, with the help of Arnold and his daughter Sally, arranges for a new driller to be brought in, the replacement man is killed and one of Dawson's men takes his place.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are sent to Oklahoma to investigate a hanging judge. Stoney's plan to go undercover backfires when he is framed for murder himself. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are assigned to investigate reports of an impostor posing as a U.S. Secret Service agent operating in Washington territory. In the guise of a government law officer, the man is shutting down all rivals of a saloon keeper's operating a crooked gambling establishment. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired in 1952 on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who is investigating a railroad holdup. Starring Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode also features James Best (1926-2015), who would go on to appear on such shows as The Andy Griffith Show, Bonanza, and The Dukes of Hazzard.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark discovers the hideout of the famous Doolin gang. Clark, along with Detective Frankie, work to infiltrate the hideout and bring the Doolin gang to justice.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Leo Gordon, Joan Shawlee, Don Kennedy, Kenneth MacDoNald, Patrick Waltz, and Ken Chryson. First aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a couple of con men attempt to snare Letty into their scheme and spirit her away to San Francisco. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, a Texas Ranger is shot down in cold blood. Determined to bring the killer to justice, the Judge and Jeff turn their focus on Curly, but with a lack of evidence the lawmen are patient until they break the case. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the towns doctor is unable to save his own father, he loses confidence in his work. Annie tries to convince him that Diablo needs him. Can Annie help him reclaim his confidence? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a girl in the woods who is running away from a man named Stark. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help an old woman find her son who has been missing for 18 years.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: Roy Rogers finds himself elected sheriff in a wild Texas town after the Civil War. But can Roy handle a place under martial law? And can he save Gabby Hayes from being executed? And how many songs will he get to sing? Clear the burrs from your saddle and get ready for a good one, also starring Marjorie Reynolds, plus Sally Payne as Belle Starr, Queen of the Oklahoma Outlaws!

programme.title: Song of Arizona
programme.desc: This Roy Rogers adventure finds Gabby Whitaker (Gabby Hayes) running a ranch for wayward boys. One of the boys uses stolen money to help Gabby pay off his debts, but things unravel when the boys father, a notorious outlaw named King Blaine, is murdered; the rest of the Blaine gang show up at Gabbys looking for the loot! Director Frank McDonald works with a fine cast, including Dale Evans, Lyle Talbot, and of course, Roys beloved horse Trigger.

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders!

programme.title: Riders of the Deadline
programme.desc: The 50th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy films finds Hoppy in a vengeful mood. When his good friend Tim Mason is unjustly sent to jail and then killed when trying to escape, Hoppys bitterness gets him drummed out of the Texas Rangers. With the help of his pals California Carson and Jimmy Rogers, he sets out to expose the real culprits and clear Tims name. The usual cast is here, including William Boyd as Hoppy, plus Andy Clyde, Jimmy Rogers, and in one of his earliest roles, Robert Mitchum.

programme.title: Range War
programme.desc: William Boyd returns in the 25th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. This time Hopalong goes undercover to expose a group of ranchers who are interfering with the building of a new railroad. Also, look for Russell Hayden as Lucky Jenkins, and Britt Wood as Speedy McGinnis. It's a great, action-packed adventure from director Leslie Selander (Flight to Mars, Riders of the Range), and further proof that no one pushes Hoppy around and gets away with it!

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: Ridin' the Lone Trail
programme.desc: Sam Newfield directs this Western about a group of outlaws who are robbing stagecoaches while being led by a mysterious outlaw on a beautiful white horse. Bob McArthur (Bob Steele) arrives to help and makes a shocking discovery when he follows the white horse to the outlaws hideout. This B-Western, one of a long line of Sam Newfield efforts, also stars Claire Rochelle and Charles King (who has over 400 acting credits to his name, beginning with The Birth of a Nation in 1915 and ending in 1957 (his death)!

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteer's head.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After shooting Luke Grayson in self-defense, Ben Cartwright must protect himself from Graysons son, Todd, who seeks to avenge his fathers death.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights try to invalidate a Spanish land grant to stop the De La Cuesta family from taking part of the Ponderosa and all of the Carson Valley settlers' land.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Blood on the Land
programme.desc: Adam Cartwright finds himself hostage to Jeb, a dangerous sheep herder who wants Ben to sign over a large plot of land.Starring Michael Landon as Little Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben helps three deserters, escaped from an Army stockade. Learning what they had to deal with, Ben promises to share the truth with his friend who is in charge of the fort.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben and Adam are in jail, about to be hung for a crime they didn't commit. Joe and Hoss must find out why the witnesses to the alleged crime have lied about what happened before the execution takes place. They receive help from a vagrant named Lassiter who is looking for the men who committed a lynching in Kansas years ago.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The son of a neighboring rancher intends to sell their land for a mining operation that will ruin the water rights agreement that Andy and Ben made years ago. Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kate's Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joe's hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotel's holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but he's not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Custer's Last Stand
programme.desc: The survivor of an Indian attack acquires a rare medicine arrow, and a menacing character named Blade (Reed Howes) will stop at nothing to take it from him. Elmer Clifton (Assassin of Youth, Seven Doors to Death) directs a memorable cast that includes Rex Lease (The Sign of the Wolf, The Monster Walks), Lona Andre (Slaves in Bondage, Death in the Air), and William Farnum (Samson and Delilah). Meanwhile, Frank McGlynn Jr is in the title role of General George A. Custer.

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Red's aunt, the Duchess, knew Steve's father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Ghost Town Gold [The Three Mesquiteers]
programme.desc: CAVALIERS OF THE CACTUS COUNTRY--ALWAYS READY FOR A FIGHT OR A FROLICK! The second entry in what would grow into a wildly popular series of Western Three Mesquiteers B-Movies produced by Republic Pictures, Ghost Town Gold tracks the titular trio as they attempt to recover the gold stolen by a gang in its effort to ruin the bank/mayor who ordered them to leave town. Frequent John Wayne collaborator Joseph Kane adds his signature directorial panache to this rousing shoot-em-up, setting the tone for a film series that was so rampantly successful, it spawned 50 sequels and a host of imitators from rival studios.

programme.title: Idaho
programme.desc: Western icon Roy Rogers, along with his trusty companion Trigger, are back for another adventure. This time, a respected judge is being framed for murder by a crooked saloon owner. Always the valiant champion, Rogers vows to clear the name of the judge and find the truth all while courting a lovely beau. Cellist turned editor turned Republic Pictures workhorse Joseph Kane takes the reins of this rousing, musical adventure, which features a number of original songs performed by Rogers himself, with the help of singer-songwriter Bob Nolan and character actor Smiley Burnette (TVs Petticoat Junction).

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Son of the Renegade
programme.desc: Johnny Carpenter (who also wrote the screenplay) stars as Red River Johnny, a gunslinger returning to his home town to clear his name of some heinous accusations. This low budget howler was the only feature directed by Reg Brown, who was better known as an editor and a director of television shows. If Ed Wood directed a western, it might have looked like this one. Enjoy!

programme.title: Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: Gene Autry stars as a ranch foreman who helps a beautiful young ranch owner who faces the opposition of local ranchers after bringing a flock of sheep into cattle country. Along with the traditional title song, musical numbers include Youre the Only Star In My Blue Heaven, Buffalo Gals, and Give Me a Pony and an Open Prairie. This Republic Pictures gem includes the usual stock company of actors, with the matchless Smiley Burnette as Genes comical sidekick, Frog Millhouse. Directed by Joseph Kane; written by Gilbert Wright, Betty Burbridge; Also starring Polly Rowles, Ruth Bacon, and George Chesebro.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the Peters family, seemingly angry at the world and desiring nothing but to be left alone, arrives in Diablo, Annie, Tagg and Lofty try to find out what is making the Peters family act so hostile. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young bank teller is in trouble after a beautiful woman robs the bank. Annie steps in to try and prove the young bank tellers innocence. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An ex-convict is trying to work as a rancher, but his outlaw brother wants him to resume his life of crime. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. A pair of crooks are aware of the lands value and intend to take it for themselves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which earned a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Annie and the Twisted Trails
programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Carolyn Craig, Ewing Mitchell, and Myron Healey. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tensions rise as a range war over water seems inevitable. A masked man dressed as Robin Hood tries to help the homesteaders by knocking down the ranchers fences. Things seem to be going well until a similarly dressed imposter robs the Diablo bank.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was niominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primtetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Dave Morgan, an honest lawyer, faces off with Carter Holmes, a crooked politician, in a fiery election campaign. Things take a turn for the worse when Holmes attempts to have his opponent killed. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Looking through an old trunk, Tagg and his friend Johnny Ward, the son of a murdered lawman, find proof that his uncle is an ex-convict and may be involved in a recent bank robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. The sheriff being the editors best man, the grief-stricken editor begins to escalate the anger towards a suspected drifter with his bias reporting. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A town blames the son-in-law of a the bank president for his murder. Cisco and Pancho work to uncover the truth before the townspeople hang the man. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: After arriving in the town of Sundance, Cisco witnesses the destruction of a newspaper office. Upon seeing this, Cisco contends with the man trying to take over the town. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho.
